summary: An army major goes undercover as a college student. His mission is both professional and personal: to protect his general's daughter from a radical militant, and to find his estranged half-brother.
cast: Shah Rukh Khan|Sushmita Sen|Sunil Shetty|Zayed Khan|Amrita Rao|Kabir Bedi|Naseeruddin Shah|Boman Irani|Bindu|Satish Shah|Kirron Kher|Nassar Abdulla|Kunal Kumar|Rajiv Panjabi|Rakhi Sawant|Murli Sharma|Praveen Sirohi|Shaji Chaudhary|Sumeet Goradia|Geeta Kapoor|Sajid Khan|Charan Saluja|Tabu
title: Main Hoon Na
